law.catch_line: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated....

section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Court" means the Court of Appeals, the Court of Special Appeals, a circuit court, the District Court of Maryland, and an orphans' court.

"Personal information" means an individual's:
Social Security number; or
Driver's license number.
"Publicly post or display" means to intentionally make available to the public.

text.section: Except as otherwise provided by law, on or after June 1, 2010, a court, to the extent practicable, may not publicly post or display on an Internet website maintained or paid for by the court an individual's personal information.
